IFilter

    • Uses of IFilter in <Unnamed>

      Classes in <Unnamed> that implement IFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LowercaseFilter
      An IFilter implementation that transforms all terms to lower case
      class  PatternExtractorFilter
      An IFilter implementation that extracts terms based on a regular expression
      class  RemovePatternFilter
      An IFilter implementation that strips characters from the terms based on a regular expression
      class  StopFilter 
      class  WordLengthFilter
      An IFilter implementation that removes terms based on term length
